channel.title: python on EMBE innovation
channel.description: Recent content in python on EMBE innovation

item.title: Maps With Other Languages
item.description: The Map Pattern in Other Languages In the first post on the map pattern I showed how the pattern could be coded in C++ in a few different ways. Now it’s time to look at some other popular languages: Rust, Java and Python. A caveat: I am not a day-to-day user of these languages and they are partly a mystery to me as I do not exactly know how they are translated to machine code at the end.
